text: War Emblem (February 20, 1999 - March 11, 2020) was an American Thoroughbred racehorse. He was the winner of the Kentucky Derby and Preakness Stakes in 2002. War Emblem was found dead in his paddock at Old Friends Equine in Georgetown, Kentucky on March 11, 2020 at the age of 21. ==References== Category:1999 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Thoroughbred racehorses
title: War Emblem
